doableProcedures.procedureDescription: Surgical operation for the reconstruction of the eardrum (tympanic membrane) and/or the small bones of the middle ear.
doableProcedures.mockupSteps: Step 1: Incision behind the ear; Step 2: Damaged tissue removal; Step 3: Graft placement; Step 4: Incision closed

doableProcedures.procedureDescription: Surgical reshaping of the pinna, or the outer ear, to improve its appearance or to correct defects.
doableProcedures.mockupSteps: Step 1: Incision made; Step 2: Cartilage reshaped; Step 3: Excess skin removed; Step 4: Incision closed

doableProcedures.procedureDescription: Surgical procedure to fix broken bones of the arm using metal rods, screws, or plates to hold the bone fragments together.
doableProcedures.mockupSteps: Step 1: Incision over the fracture site; Step 2: Bones realigned; Step 3: Metal hardware attached; Step 4: Incision closed

doableProcedures.procedureDescription: Surgical procedure to repair torn or damaged tendons in the arm.
doableProcedures.mockupSteps: Step 1: Incision made in the arm; Step 2: Tendon ends reattached; Step 3: Incision closed

doableProcedures.procedureDescription: Replacement of a knee joint with a prosthetic joint.
doableProcedures.mockupSteps: Step 1: Incision made in the knee; Step 2: Damaged joint surfaces removed; Step 3: Prosthetic joint inserted; Step 4: Incision closed

doableProcedures.procedureDescription: Surgical procedure to reconstruct the ligament in the center of your knee with a new ligament.
doableProcedures.mockupSteps: Step 1: Incision made in the knee; Step 2: Damaged ACL removed; Step 3: Graft ligament placed; Step 4: Incision closed

doableProcedures.procedureDescription: Surgical removal of the lens of the eye that has developed an opacification.
doableProcedures.mockupSteps: Step 1: Small incision made in the eye; Step 2: Clouded lens removed; Step 3: Artificial lens inserted

doableProcedures.procedureDescription: Laser surgery to correct refractive vision issues.
doableProcedures.mockupSteps: Step 1: Corneal flap created; Step 2: Corneal reshaping with laser; Step 3: Flap repositioned
